title.value: US Public Health Emergency Outbreak Information

description.value: This profile represents information that is required during a public health emergency/outbreak. This information will be recorded using a question/answer pattern with questions specific to the public health emergency/outbreak.

short.value: Information that is required during a public health emergency/outbreak.
